name: Pumpkin Soup (Slowdul)
description:
This soup better be good...

You are distrubed from your "eternal" sleep by an old witch. And what she wants is clear like water. A clear water that would be much more enjoyable if you could add pumpkin to it. Because yes, the witch wants pumpkins, to make a very good soup. Will you help her or go back to rest, the choice is yours... But they say she makes incredible soup...

DEFAULT CONTROLS (arrow keys and num pad recommended) :

F2: Toggle FPS
F4: Toggle Fullscreen
F5: Reset

Arrow keys: Move
Enter Key: Validate
Shift: Dash
ESC: Cancel/Options
Page Down: Fast Dialog
Press X (Xbox) or Square (Playstation) to toggle your Controller

Note: The Save feature won't work, but the game is short (~20m)
